backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the Tribes Of Rudra backend with profile CRUD, post/reply creation, and access-controlled APIs using authorization and blob-storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping implemented feature IDs to their affected files, component dependencies, test IDs, and confidence levels for the Tribes Of Rudra rebrand and redesign.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary providing one-line descriptions of each frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the purpose and theming of every component and page.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS base layer defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with the page title set to 'Tribes Of Rudra' and a spiritual meta description for the Hindu community platform.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for feed, discover, and profile pages, wrapping them in a layout with NavBar, Footer, ProfileSetupModal, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/CreatePostForm.t: Post creation form with a spiritual placeholder text, Ctrl+Enter shortcut, and a 'Share' button that calls the createPost mutation and shows devotional toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component branded as 'Tribes Of Rudra' with the emblem logo, Sanskrit tagline, copyright notice, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/InterestTag.tsx: Reusable pill component for displaying or selecting interest tags, with selectable/selected state styling using saffron/accent color tokens and smooth scale transitions.
frontend/src/components/NavBar.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with logo, nav links (Feed, Discover, Profile), and login/logout controls using Internet Identity. Supports both desktop and mobile (hamburger menu) layouts.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a single post with author name, timestamp, content, and a collapsible replies section. Authenticated users can submit replies via the embedded ReplyForm.
frontend/src/components/ProfileCard.tsx: Renders a compact user profile card with avatar, display name, join date, bio, and up to 4 interest tags, linking to the full profile page.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for first-time profile creation, collecting display name, bio, and spiritual interests, then calling the createProfile mutation and navigating to the feed.
frontend/src/components/ReplyForm.tsx: Small form component for submitting a text reply to a post, using the useAddReply mutation and showing toast notifications on success or failure.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) via React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook that manage AuthClient lifecycle, identity persistence, and login/logout state for Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for profile and post operations (fetch, create, update) and a discovery query to find profiles by interests, all using the ICP actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts, configures Tailwind, and defines a saffron/gold/indigo design token palette for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoverPage.tsx: Page that lets authenticated users filter and discover other devotee profiles by selecting spiritual interest tags, with an auth gate for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Main feed page featuring a hero banner, spiritual pillars section, post creation form, and a list of all posts, with login prompt for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile detail page that displays a user's avatar, bio, interests, join date, and their posts, with skeleton loading states and a not-found fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with helpers to persist, retrieve, and clear those parameters via sessionStorage and history.replaceState.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, defining dark mode, custom fonts (Plus Jakarta Sans, Cinzel), an oklch-based color palette, extended border radii, box shadows, and animation keyframes using typography, container-queries, and tailwindcss-animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest for 'Tribes Of Rudra', a spiritually-focused Hindu community web app, capturing schema version, architectural notes, existing feature list with requirement IDs, known issues, and image asset requirements.
